tool.name: db
tool.command:
tripaille db index
#if $mode: --mode "$mode" #end if #if $table: --table "$table" #end if #if $index_name: --index_name "$index_name" #end if #if $queues: --queues "$queues" #end if #for $rep in $repeat_fields: --fields "$rep.fields" #end for #for $rep in $repeat_links: --links "$rep.links" #end for #if $tokenizer: --tokenizer "$tokenizer" #end if #if $job_name: --job_name "$job_name" #end if #if $no_wait: $no_wait #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: mode
param.label: Mode
param.help: Indexing mode: 'website' to index everything, 'table' to index a single table (default: website)

inputs.repeat: <param name="fields" label="Fields" argument="fields" type="text" help="Fields to index (only in 'table' mode), syntax: |, field_type should be one of 'string', 'keyword', 'date', 'long', 'double', 'boolean', 'ip', 'object', 'nested', 'geo_point', 'geo_shape', or 'completion'" />
<param name="links" label="Links" argument="links" type="text" help="List of links to show to users, syntax: |" />

param.name: tokenizer
param.label: Tokenizer
param.help: Tokenizer to use (one of 'standard', 'letter', 'lowercase', 'whitespace', 'uax_url_email', 'classic', 'ngram', 'edge_ngram', 'keyword', 'pattern', or 'path_hierarchy'; default='standard')

param.name: no_wait
param.label: No Wait
param.help: Do not wait for job to complete
